text:
With the following procedure it is possible to create a document with a invalid url:

1)
Request a document that does not exist and therefore use an illegual url

for example:
http://lenya.zones.apache.org:9999/default/authoring/scjpoi jaspdfoij apsodifj
> A 404
Screen with the option to create that document is presented (that link should not be there
in the above case)

2) When the option to create tha document is chosen the illegual url
is accepted

The document created is not accessible via authoring gui anymore and has
to be deleted by other means.
creator: ragaller@apache.org
